meanings: (조금 후에, 곧) soon, shortly, any minute
(조금 전에, 막) just (now), a minute[moment] ago

vlive.korean: 이제 점점점 나아지고 있으니까 금방... getting better right now. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 소통타임🐻
금방 가죠 - 일주일에? That's not hard. - Just in a week? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: That's not hard. - Just in a week?

vlive.korean: 타자 진짜 재밌는데 - 피피티는 그래도 금방... 그러니까 막 뭐지? Typing is fun. - Powerpoint is...How should I explain this? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: Typing is fun. - Powerpoint is...How should I explain this?

vlive.korean: 이만큼이나 묶인다고요 짱 많이 자랐죠? 금방 자랐죠? My hair can tie up this much! It grew a lot, right? In no time, right? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연락👋🏼
vlive.english: My hair can tie up this much! It grew a lot, right? In no time, right?

vlive.korean: 금방 찾아 올게요. I'll come soon. 듣기 View video VICTON : 숩이 등장..! 앨리스 섭섭했어요?!😔

examples.korean: The cat crouched in the grass, poised to jump. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 고양이는 풀밭에 웅크리고 있었다. 금방이라도 튀어 오를 태세로. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cat crouched in the grass, poised to jump. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I feel ready to drop. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 금방이라도 쓰러질 것 같아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I feel ready to drop. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was close to tears. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 금방이라도 눈물을 흘릴 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
